mapper.select: SELECT call.call_no FROM call, users, match WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=match.passenger_no AND call.call_no=match.call_no AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND call.call_code=#{callCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deal(deal_no, user_no, call_no, passenger_offer, driver_offer) VALUES (seq_deal_deal_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{callNo}, #{passengerOffer}, #{driverOffer:NUMERIC})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET deal_code = CASE WHEN deal_code = 0 THEN 1 WHEN deal_code = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT deal.call_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM deal, users WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND users.role='passenger'

SELECT deal.driver_offer, deal.call_no, deal.user_no FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND call.call_no=#{value} AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND users.role='driver'

SELECT deal.call_no, deal.user_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND users.role='passenger' AND call.call_state_code='운행전' ORDER BY call.call_no

SELECT call.start_addr, call.end_addr, call.call_no FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND users.role='passenger' AND call.call_state_code='운행전' ORDER BY call.call_no

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT deal.call_no, deal.deal_no, deal.user_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND users.role='passenger' ) countTable
SELECT deal.call_no FROM call, users, deal WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=deal.user_no AND call.call_no=deal.call_no AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND call.call_code=#{callCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shares(share_no, user_no, call_no, share_count, start_share_count, max_share_count, share_date, star) VALUES (seq_shares_share_no.nextval, #{firstSharePassengerNo}, #{callNo}, #{firstShareCount}, #{startShareCount}, #{maxShareCount}, TO_DATE(#{shareDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET share_code = CASE WHEN share_code = 0 THEN 1 WHEN share_code = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT user_no, call_no, share_count, start_share_count, max_share_count, share_date, star FROM ( SELECT s.user_no, s.call_no, s.share_count, s.start_share_count, s.max_share_count, s.share_date, s.star, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY s.call_no ORDER BY s.share_no) AS row_num FROM shares s JOIN call c ON s.call_no = c.call_no JOIN users u ON u.user_no = s.user_no WHERE c.call_state_code = '운행전') WHERE row_num = 1) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT call_no, start_addr, end_addr FROM ( SELECT c.call_no, c.start_addr, c.end_addr, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY s.call_no ORDER BY s.share_no) AS row_num FROM shares s JOIN call c ON s.call_no = c.call_no JOIN users u ON u.user_no = s.user_no WHERE c.call_state_code = '운행전') WHERE row_num = 1) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT user_no, call_no, share_count, start_share_count, max_share_count, share_date, star FROM ( SELECT s.user_no, s.call_no, s.share_count, s.start_share_count, s.max_share_count, s.share_date, s.star, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY s.call_no ORDER BY s.share_no) AS row_num FROM shares s JOIN call c ON s.call_no = c.call_no JOIN users u ON u.user_no = s.user_no WHERE c.call_state_code = '운행전') WHERE row_num = 1 ) countTable
SELECT shares.call_no, shares.share_count, shares.start_share_count, shares.share_date FROM shares, users WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=shares.user_no
